text: 6:18 Dɨboboniba 23:19; 1 Samuel 15:29Egha datɨrɨghɨn akar pumuning iti, kar Godɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzim, ko Godɨn arazir uan ziam dɨborim, aning otevkɨnighan kogham. God uabɨ ifarir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, e gumazamizir ara ghua Godɨn boroghɨn mongeziba, e Godɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzim gɨnɨghnɨgh egh e uan naviba gavgavim dar anɨng, egh bizir aghuir e fogha iniamiba mɨzuamvɨra ikiam.
